title: Second Forum of Anthroposophical Worldwide Members
cleaned_text: Second Forum of Anthroposophical Worldwide Members Jun 03, 2023 3:00PM—8:00PM Location Goetheanum/Schreinerei, Dornach, Switzerland and online (Central European Time) Event Contact Executive Council at the Goetheanum | Categories [Gathering](https://anthroposophy.org/inspire_events_categories/gathering/), [Goetheanum](https://anthroposophy.org/inspire_events_categories/goetheanum/), [ONLINE](https://anthroposophy.org/inspire_events_categories/online/), [Society-Threefolding](https://anthroposophy.org/inspire_events_categories/social/) FOR MEMBERS OF THE ANTHROPOSOPHICAL SOCIETY Goetheanum, 26 May 2023 Dear Members of the Anthroposophical Society, We warmly invite you to the second Members' Forum which will be held on Saturday, 3 June 2023, at the usual time between 3 and 8 pm CEST, both in the Schreinerei building at the Goetheanum and online. Please find attached the programme and important guidelines for preparation. There will be German to English interpretation again. Now that the procedure is familiar, there will be more time for the small group work. Those who actively took part in the first Members' Forum are already part of a topic group. Newcomers can choose from the existing groups during the Forum. Registration for the Members' Forum on Saturday 3 June 2023, 3 to 8 pm CEST: - Registration for in-person participation: [mitgliederforum@goetheanum.ch](mailto:mitgliederforum@goetheanum.ch) - Registration for online participation on Zoom [via this link](https://goetheanum-ch.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZwvdeuhrT4oHtZapSi4ptuZaJ3sNxdWjBuY) Tutorial for Zoom and Mural Some online participants experienced difficulties with the electronic formats at the last Forum. We therefore offer a training session on Zoom on Thursday 1 June 2023, from 3 to 4 pm for members who would like to learn more about the use of Zoom and Mural. Please [register here](https://goetheanum-ch.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZUqduyrrzktHtKytE13u42RjfitScINoaxZ). Preparation To ensure an effective meeting we recommend that you come well prepared. Many topics have been reported on in recent months in [Anthroposophy Worldwide](http://www.anthroposophie.org/en) and can be found there, including those discussed at the past two AGMs. With warm greetings, Matthias
